participant_1.background:
I remember playing in the rain with my siblings, not caring about the world.
I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it.
My dog has been my best companion since we got her.
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.

participant_2.background:
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.
I like to take my time getting ready in the morning, then grab a quick coffee and head out on my daily drive.
i am an avid fisherman.
I learned a lot about myself and my body through yoga.
i know how to pilot a plane.

content.text: I once got pulled over for speeding and wrote a short story about it while the cop was writing my ticket.
That is awesome! I once took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.
That must have been exhilarating! I'm more of a suburban dweller myself. I like to have a backyard for my dogs.
I love animals! I'm an avid fisherman. I used to live in the suburbs, but I prefer to take my time getting ready in the morning, then grab a quick coffee and head out on my daily drive.
I'm sure you miss your pets! I'm grateful for my dog, she's my best companion.
She must be a great friend! I learned a lot about myself and my body through yoga.
That's awesome! I love writing and I've been nervous to start writing my own songs.
I'm sure you'll be great! I know how to pilot a plane, maybe I can give you a lesson sometime!
That would be amazing! I've always wanted to learn how to fly.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm sure we could be great friends
